 Accessibility



While the festival is outdoors, disabled access is possible. Please be aware that not all surfaces are level and the site has a pronounced slope.

There are fully accessible disabled toilets.

Assistance dogs are most welcome, and like other dogs are allowed in all public areas of the site â€“ but please do take care, especially when the site is busy.

If you would like assistance at any point please ask a member of our volunteer staff.
